textBox.richText: While this is not the final release in the beta cycle for v1.4 we are very close.  Currently, we are looking at one more beta release to round out the rental functionality and to add in a few other items that have been on the to do list for far too long.  If you have any items that are particularly annoying to you, please let us know at support@zarrastudios.com and we will do our best to get them included in the final beta. Included in this release: Additions: • Tax Report: A tax report has been added to the reports section • Inventory Report: A current inventory report has been added to the reports section. • The total replacement value of all rentals on an invoice is now displayed in the footer of invoices that include rental items. • Addition of rental renewals. Accessible via the Action menu • Addition of rental returns. Overdue calculations are automatic when an item is returned past its due date. Corrections: • Correction to an issue with printing multi-page reports • A few errors in invoice printing were corrected to allow for unusually sized invoices. • Corrected issue with being unable to remove a rental agreement • Corrected an issue with being unable to add a rental serial number • Corrected a calculation error with the activity reports Notes: As is normal in the beta process, this build will do a database update. As usual with a beta release, please back up your data. Please report any errors you encounter while exploring this beta release. MSZ
